amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A House Report 118-147 to strike Sec. 546 to maintain current training requirements for a person who is applying for an airline transport certificate with an airplane category and class rating.
amendment.purpose: Amendment strikes section 546 to maintain current training requirements for a person who is applying for an airline transport certificate with an airplane category and class rating.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langworthy amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 191 (Roll no. 341).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Langworthy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langworthy amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 191 (Roll no. 341).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
